description: Describes the snapshots for the specified WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: RebuildSnapshots
nested_items.description: Information about the snapshots that can be used to rebuild a WorkSpace. These snapshots include the user volume.

nested_items.name: SnapshotTime
nested_items.description: The time when the snapshot was created.

nested_items.name: RestoreSnapshots
nested_items.description: Information about the snapshots that can be used to restore a WorkSpace. These snapshots include both the root volume and the user volume.

nested_items.name: SnapshotTime
nested_items.description: The time when the snapshot was created.
